mentionedBy.name: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Rated as best overall CrowdStrike alternative. All-in-One Cybersecurity Platform with more budget-friendly pricing structure, particularly for small and medium-sized organizations. Offers straightforward deployment process for businesses without large IT departments.

mentionedBy.name: SentinelOne Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Comprehensive cybersecurity platform with threat detection/response, UEBA, and NTA, broader security capabilities beyond endpoint

mentionedBy.name: SentinelOne Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Offers broader range of security capabilities beyond endpoint focus. Comprehensive suite including threat detection and response, user and entity behavior analytics (UEBA), and network traffic analysis (NTA). Unlike SentinelOne's primary endpoint focus, provides wider security coverage.

2024.note: Comprehensive cybersecurity platform with threat detection/response, UEBA, and NTA, broader security capabilities beyond endpoint

2025.note: Rated as best overall CrowdStrike alternative. All-in-One Cybersecurity Platform with more budget-friendly pricing structure, particularly for small and medium-sized organizations. Offers straightforward deployment process for businesses without large IT departments.

Offers broader range of security capabilities beyond endpoint focus. Comprehensive suite including threat detection and response, user and entity behavior analytics (UEBA), and network traffic analysis (NTA). Unlike SentinelOne's primary endpoint focus, provides wider security coverage.
